=−4q[ddqln⁡(θ4θ2)]= -4q \left[ \frac{d}{dq} \ln \left( \frac{\theta_4}{\theta_2} \right) \right] =−4q[dqd​ln(θ2​θ4​​)]

而

θ4θ2=12q1/4Q32Q12,−ln⁡θ4θ2=ln⁡2+14ln⁡q+2ln⁡Q1Q3\frac{\theta_4}{\theta_2} = \frac{1}{2q^{1/4}} \frac{Q_3^2}{Q_1^2}, \quad -\ln \frac{\theta_4}{\theta_2} = \ln 2 + \frac{1}{4} \ln q + 2 \ln \frac{Q_1}{Q_3} θ2​θ4​​=2q1/41​Q12​Q32​​,−lnθ2​θ4​​=ln2+41​lnq+2lnQ3​Q1​​

∴−4qddqln⁡(θ4θ2)=+4q(141q+2ddqlog⁡Q1Q3)\therefore \quad -4q \frac{d}{dq} \ln (\frac{\theta_4}{\theta_2}) = +4q \left( \frac{1}{4} \frac{1}{q} + 2 \frac{d}{dq} \log \frac{Q_1}{Q_3} \right) ∴−4qdqd​ln(θ2​θ4​​)=+4q(41​q1​+2dqd​logQ3​Q1​​)

=8qddqlog⁡Q1Q3+1= 8q \frac{d}{dq} \log \frac{Q_1}{Q_3} + 1 =8qdqd​logQ3​Q1​​+1

像 Lemma 3.1 那种 ddq(log⁡Q1−log⁡Q3)=ddq(∑n=1∞log⁡(1+q2n)−∑n=1∞log⁡(1−q2n−1))\frac{d}{dq} (\log Q_1 - \log Q_3) = \frac{d}{dq} \left( \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \log(1+q^{2n}) - \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \log(1-q^{2n-1}) \right)dqd​(logQ1​−logQ3​)=dqd​(∑n=1∞​log(1+q2n)−∑n=1∞​log(1−q2n−1))

=∑n=1∞2nq2n−11+q2n+∑n=1∞(2n−1)q2n−21−q2n−1,代入上式即得 (3.2.20)= \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{2n q^{2n-1}}{1+q^{2n}} + \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{(2n-1) q^{2n-2}}{1-q^{2n-1}}, \quad \text{代入上式即得 (3.2.20)} =n=1∑∞​1+q2n2nq2n−1​+n=1∑∞​1−q2n−1(2n−1)q2n−2​,代入上式即得 (3.2.20)

对于 (3.2.21)，也是由 (2.3.14) 类似得 π4θ24=(1θ4ddsθ4−1θ3ddsθ3)\frac{\pi}{4} \theta_2^4 = (\frac{1}{\theta_4} \frac{d}{ds} \theta_4 - \frac{1}{\theta_3} \frac{d}{ds} \theta_3)4π​θ24​=(θ4​1​dsd​θ4​−θ3​1​dsd​θ3​)

θ24=−4q(1θ4dθ4dq−1θ3dθ3dq)\theta_2^4 = -4q \left( \frac{1}{\theta_4} \frac{d\theta_4}{dq} - \frac{1}{\theta_3} \frac{d\theta_3}{dq} \right) θ24​=−4q(θ4​1​dqdθ4​​−θ3​1​dqdθ3​​)

=−4q(ddqln⁡(θ4θ3))=4qddqln⁡θ3θ4= -4q \left( \frac{d}{dq} \ln (\frac{\theta_4}{\theta_3}) \right) = 4q \frac{d}{dq} \ln \frac{\theta_3}{\theta_4} =−4q(dqd​ln(θ3​θ4​​))=4qdqd​lnθ4​θ3​​

θ3θ4=Q22Q32,ln⁡θ3θ4=2ln⁡Q2Q3\frac{\theta_3}{\theta_4} = \frac{Q_2^2}{Q_3^2}, \quad \ln \frac{\theta_3}{\theta_4} = 2 \ln \frac{Q_2}{Q_3} θ4​θ3​​=Q32​Q22​​,lnθ4​θ3​​=2lnQ3​Q2​​

ddqln⁡θ3θ4=2ddqln⁡Q1Q3=2∑n=1∞2nq2n−11+q2n+2∑n=1∞(2n−1)q2n−21−q2n−1\frac{d}{dq} \ln \frac{\theta_3}{\theta_4} = 2 \frac{d}{dq} \ln \frac{Q_1}{Q_3} = 2 \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{2n q^{2n-1}}{1+q^{2n}} + 2 \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{(2n-1) q^{2n-2}}{1-q^{2n-1}} dqd​lnθ4​θ3​​=2dqd​lnQ3​Q1​​=2n=1∑∞​1+q2n2nq2n−1​+2n=1∑∞​1−q2n−1(2n−1)q2n−2​

=2∑n=0∞(2n+1)q2n1+q2n+1+2∑n=0∞(2n+1)q2n1−q2n+1= 2 \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{(2n+1) q^{2n}}{1+q^{2n+1}} + 2 \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{(2n+1) q^{2n}}{1-q^{2n+1}} =2n=0∑∞​1+q2n+1(2n+1)q2n​+2n=0∑∞​1−q2n+1(2n+1)q2n​

乘上 4q4q4q 有

θ24(q)=8∑n=0∞(2n+1)q2n+11+q2n+1+8∑n=0∞(2n+1)q2n+11−q2n+1\theta_2^4(q) = 8 \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{(2n+1) q^{2n+1}}{1+q^{2n+1}} + 8 \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{(2n+1) q^{2n+1}}{1-q^{2n+1}} θ24​(q)=8n=0∑∞​1+q2n+1(2n+1)q2n+1​+8n=0∑∞​1−q2n+1(2n+1)q2n+1​

对于 (3.2.22)

π4θ44=1θ3dθ3ds−1θ2dθ2ds=−πq(1θ3dθ3dq−1θ2dθ2dq)\begin{aligned}\frac{\pi}{4} \theta_4^4 = \frac{1}{\theta_3} \frac{d\theta_3}{ds} - \frac{1}{\theta_2} \frac{d\theta_2}{ds}\\ = -\pi q (\frac{1}{\theta_3} \frac{d\theta_3}{dq} - \frac{1}{\theta_2} \frac{d\theta_2}{dq}) \end{aligned} 4π​θ44​=θ3​1​dsdθ3​​−θ2​1​dsdθ2​​=−πq(θ3​1​dqdθ3​​−θ2​1​dqdθ2​​)​

θ44=−4q(1θ3dθ3dq−1θ2dθ2dq)=+4qddqln⁡θ2θ3\theta_4^4 = -4q (\frac{1}{\theta_3} \frac{d\theta_3}{dq} - \frac{1}{\theta_2} \frac{d\theta_2}{dq}) = +4q \frac{d}{dq} \ln \frac{\theta_2}{\theta_3} θ44​=−4q(θ3​1​dqdθ3​​−θ2​1​dqdθ2​​)=+4qdqd​lnθ3​θ2​​

θ2θ3=2q14(Q1Q2)2,ln⁡θ2θ3=ln⁡2+14ln⁡q+2ln⁡Q1Q2\frac{\theta_2}{\theta_3} = 2q^{\frac{1}{4}} \left(\frac{Q_1}{Q_2}\right)^2, \quad \ln \frac{\theta_2}{\theta_3} = \ln 2 + \frac{1}{4} \ln q + 2 \ln \frac{Q_1}{Q_2} θ3​θ2​​=2q41​(Q2​Q1​​)2,lnθ3​θ2​​=ln2+41​lnq+2lnQ2​Q1​​

ddqln⁡θ2θ3=14q+2∑n=1∞2nq2n−11+q2n−2∑n=1∞(2n−1)q2n−21+q2n−1\frac{d}{dq} \ln \frac{\theta_2}{\theta_3} = \frac{1}{4q} + 2 \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{2n q^{2n-1}}{1+q^{2n}} - 2 \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{(2n-1) q^{2n-2}}{1+q^{2n-1}} dqd​lnθ3​θ2​​=4q1​+2n=1∑∞​1+q2n2nq2n−1​−2n=1∑∞​1+q2n−1(2n−1)q2n−2​

∴θ44=1+8∑n=1∞2nq2n1+q2n−8∑n=1∞(2n−1)q2n−11+q2n−1\therefore \quad \theta_4^4 = 1 + 8 \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{2n q^{2n}}{1+q^{2n}} - 8 \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{(2n-1) q^{2n-1}}{1+q^{2n-1}} ∴θ44​=1+8n=1∑∞​1+q2n2nq2n​−8n=1∑∞​1+q2n−1(2n−1)q2n−1​

=1+8∑n=0∞2nq2n1+q2n−8∑n=0∞(2n+1)q2n+11+q2n+1= 1 + 8 \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{2n q^{2n}}{1+q^{2n}} - 8 \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{(2n+1) q^{2n+1}}{1+q^{2n+1}} =1+8n=0∑∞​1+q2n2nq2n​−8n=0∑∞​1+q2n+1(2n+1)q2n+1​

定理 3.2

对 ∣q∣<1|q|<1∣q∣<1

θ34(q)=1+8∑n≠0(mod 4)n≥1nqn1−qn(3.2.23)\theta_3^4(q) = 1 + 8 \sum_{\substack{n \ne 0 (\text{mod } 4) \\ n \ge 1}} \frac{n q^n}{1-q^n} \tag{3.2.23} θ34​(q)=1+8n=0(mod 4)n≥1​∑​1−qnnqn​(3.2.23)

θ44(q)−θ24(q)=1−24∑n=0∞(2n+1)q2n+11+q2n+1(3.2.24) \theta_4^4(q) - \theta_2^4(q) = 1 - 24 \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{(2n+1) q^{2n+1}}{1+q^{2n+1}} \tag{3.2.24} θ44​(q)−θ24​(q)=1−24n=0∑∞​1+q2n+1(2n+1)q2n+1​(3.2.24)

Proof. (3.2.23) 由 (3.2.20) 与 (3.2.19) 有 （

∑n=0∞2nq2n1+q2n=∑n=0∞2(2n+1)q4n+21−q4n+2=∑n=0∞(4n+2)q4n+21−q4n+2\sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{2n q^{2n}}{1+q^{2n}} = \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{2(2n+1) q^{4n+2}}{1-q^{4n+2}} = \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{(4n+2) q^{4n+2}}{1-q^{4n+2}} n=0∑∞​1+q2n2nq2n​=n=0∑∞​1−q4n+22(2n+1)q4n+2​=n=0∑∞​1−q4n+2(4n+2)q4n+2​

∴θ34(q)=1+8∑n=0∞(4n+2)q4n+21−q4n+2+8∑n=0∞(2n+1)q2n+11−q2n+1\therefore \quad \theta_3^4(q) = 1 + 8 \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{(4n+2) q^{4n+2}}{1-q^{4n+2}} + 8 \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{(2n+1) q^{2n+1}}{1-q^{2n+1}} ∴θ34​(q)=1+8n=0∑∞​1−q4n+2(4n+2)q4n+2​+8n=0∑∞​1−q2n+1(2n+1)q2n+1​

由于 2n+1, 4n+22n+1, \ 4n+22n+1, 4n+2 跑遍不被 4 整除的数 (n≠0,mod 4n \ne 0, \text{mod } 4n=0,mod 4)，则

得 (3.2.23) 式。

现证 (3.2.24) 在 命题 3.2 里作差 是

θ44−θ24=1+8∑n=0∞2nq2n1+q2n−8∑n=0∞(2n+1)q2n+11+q2n+1−8∑n=0∞(2n+1)q2n+11+q2n+1−8∑n=0∞(2n+1)q2n+11−q2n+1=1−16∑n=0∞(2n+1)q2n+11+q2n+1+8∑n=0∞2nq2n1+q2n−8∑n=0∞(2n+1)q2n+11−q2n+1\begin{aligned} \theta_4^4 - \theta_2^4& = 1 + 8 \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{2n q^{2n}}{1+q^{2n}} - 8 \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{(2n+1) q^{2n+1}}{1+q^{2n+1}}\\ &- 8 \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{(2n+1) q^{2n+1}}{1+q^{2n+1}} - 8 \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{(2n+1) q^{2n+1}}{1-q^{2n+1}}\\ &= 1 - 16 \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{(2n+1) q^{2n+1}}{1+q^{2n+1}} + 8 \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{2n q^{2n}}{1+q^{2n}} - 8 \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{(2n+1) q^{2n+1}}{1-q^{2n+1}} \end{aligned} θ44​−θ24​​=1+8n=0∑∞​1+q2n2nq2n​−8n=0∑∞​1+q2n+1(2n+1)q2n+1​−8n=0∑∞​1+q2n+1(2n+1)q2n+1​−8n=0∑∞​1−q2n+1(2n+1)q2n+1​=1−16n=0∑∞​1+q2n+1(2n+1)q2n+1​+8n=0∑∞​1+q2n2nq2n​−8n=0∑∞​1−q2n+1(2n+1)q2n+1​​

在 Lemma 3.1 代替 q→−qq \to -qq→−q

∑n=0∞n(−1)nqn1+(−1)nqn=∑n=0∞2nq2n1+q2n−∑n=0∞(2n+1)q2n+11−q2n+1=−∑n=0∞(2n+1)q2n+11+q2n+1\sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{n(-1)^n q^n}{1+(-1)^n q^n} = \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{2n q^{2n}}{1+q^{2n}} - \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{(2n+1) q^{2n+1}}{1-q^{2n+1}}=-\sum_{n=0}^\infty\frac{(2n+1)q^{2n+1}}{1+q^{2n+1}} n=0∑∞​1+(−1)nqnn(−1)nqn​=n=0∑∞​1+q2n2nq2n​−n=0∑∞​1−q2n+1(2n+1)q2n+1​=−n=0∑∞​1+q2n+1(2n+1)q2n+1​

∴8∑n=0∞2nq2n1+q2n−8∑n=0∞(2n+1)q2n+11−q2n+1=−8∑n=0∞(2n+1)q2n+11+q2n+1\therefore \quad 8 \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{2n q^{2n}}{1+q^{2n}} - 8 \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{(2n+1) q^{2n+1}}{1-q^{2n+1}} = -8 \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{(2n+1) q^{2n+1}}{1+q^{2n+1}} ∴8n=0∑∞​1+q2n2nq2n​−8n=0∑∞​1−q2n+1(2n+1)q2n+1​=−8n=0∑∞​1+q2n+1(2n+1)q2n+1​

代入得 (3.2.24)。

由 (3.2.24) 立得 (3.2.16)。因为 θ34=θ44+θ24\theta_3^4 = \theta_4^4 + \theta_2^4θ34​=θ44​+θ24​ (2.1.10)

θ44−θ24=θ34−2θ24=θ34(1−2θ24θ34)=θ34(1−2k2)\theta_4^4 - \theta_2^4 = \theta_3^4 - 2\theta_2^4 = \theta_3^4 \left( 1 - 2\frac{\theta_2^4}{\theta_3^4} \right) = \theta_3^4 (1-2k^2) θ44​−θ24​=θ34​−2θ24​=θ34​(1−2θ34​θ24​​)=θ34​(1−2k2)

=(2Kπ)2(1−2k2)= \left(\frac{2K}{\pi}\right)^2 (1-2k^2) =(π2K​)2(1−2k2)
